hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry

Class Plane3

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry.Plane
      • hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry.Plane3

  • public class Plane3
extends Plane
    An infinite plane in 3D space. It is specified with a point and a normal vector. The normal is not necessarily unit length.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

      • create

        public static Plane3 create(Vector3 point,
            Vector3 normal)
        Creates a new plane from a point and a normal vector. The normal does not need to be of unit length.
        Parameters:
        point - a point of the plane
        normal - a vector perpendicular to the plane
        Returns:
        the plane defined by the arguments
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the normal vector is too small

      • intersect

        Returns the intersection of this plane and a line.
        Parameters:
        line - the line to intersect with
        Returns:
        the intersection point
        Throws:
        DegenerateCaseException - when this plane and the line are parallel
